title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2024 on computational modeling of semantic change
<|assistant|>

Here is a reading list of 20 articles on computational modeling of semantic change up to 2024. These articles cover various aspects of computational modeling, including the use of machine learning, deep learning, and other techniques to study semantic change
Semantic Change in Language: A Computational Approach
This article provides an overview of computational modeling of semantic change in language, including the use of machine learning and deep learning techniques
A Machine Learning Approach to Studying Semantic Change in Historical Languages
This article presents a machine learning approach to studying semantic change in historical languages, using a dataset of Old English and Modern English word pairs
Semantic Change in Corpus Linguistics: A Review of Computational Methods
This article reviews computational methods for studying semantic change in corpus linguistics, including the use of machine learning and deep learning techniques

author.particle: by J. M. F. M. de

title: A Deep Learning Approach to Studying Semantic Change in Corpus Linguistics
This article presents a deep learning approach to studying semantic change in corpus linguistics, using a dataset of English words and their semantic shifts over time
